body_content.explanation: a device or part of a device that makes it possible to connect one piece of electrical equipment to another by allowing contact between wires, electrical components (= parts), etc. :
examples: This charger doesn't have the right connector for my phone.
USB connectors are sometimes referred to as "male" connectors, plugging into a "female" port.
This easy-to-set-up external device connects to the monitor connector of a computer.

body_content.explanation: an object that connects two pipes, tubes, etc. so that something such as water or gas can flow from one to the other:
examples: We sell connectors for outdoor taps and hosepipes.
Water pipes are linked to the basin by 15mm connectors.
